title: mnml Men's B572 Studded Flare Denim
description: B572 Studded Flare Denim are designed with our new B fit, and is constructed from washed black denim, panelling at the inseam and outseam from contrasting denim for a slight flare, a deconstructed hem, and is finished with stud details entirely covering the outside panel.
Size and Fit: B-Fit is a flare denim with a relaxed fit throughout the hip and thigh, and tapers to a slim fit at the knee.
Fabric Type: 100% cotton, constucted without stretch or spandex.
Model is 6’1, 140 lbs and wears a size 30.

B572 Studded Flare Denim are designed with our new B fit, and is constructed from washed blue denim, panelling at the inseam and outseam from contrasting denim for a slight flare, a deconstructed hem, and is finished with stud details entirely covering the outside panel.
